tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_programs; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_programs AS SELECT th.amp_theme_id, th.parent_theme_id, th.theme_code, th.name, COALESCE(line.program_setting_id, 999999999) AS program_setting_id, COALESCE(line.program_setting_name, 'Undefined') AS program_setting_name, COALESCE(b0.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id0, COALESCE(b0.name, 'Undefined') AS name0, COALESCE(b1.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id1, COALESCE(b1.name, 'Undefined') AS name1, COALESCE(b2.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id2, COALESCE(b2.name, 'Undefined') AS name2, COALESCE(b3.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id3, COALESCE(b3.name, 'Undefined') AS name3, COALESCE(b4.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id4, COALESCE(b4.name, 'Undefined') AS name4, COALESCE(b5.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id5, COALESCE(b5.name, 'Undefined') AS name5, COALESCE(b6.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id6, COALESCE(b6.name, 'Undefined') AS name6, COALESCE(b7.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id7, COALESCE(b7.name, 'Undefined') AS name7, COALESCE(b8.amp_theme_id, 999999999) AS id8, COALESCE(b8.name, 'Undefined') AS name8 FROM amp_theme th JOIN all_programs_with_levels line ON th.amp_theme_id = line.amp_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b0 ON b0.amp_theme_id = line.id0 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b1 ON b1.amp_theme_id = line.id1 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b2 ON b2.amp_theme_id = line.id2 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b3 ON b3.amp_theme_id = line.id3 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b4 ON b4.amp_theme_id = line.id4 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b5 ON b5.amp_theme_id = line.id5 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b6 ON b6.amp_theme_id = line.id6 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b7 ON b7.amp_theme_id = line.id7 LEFT JOIN amp_theme b8 ON b8.amp_theme_id = line.id8
UNION ALL
SELECT 999999999, null, 'Undefined', 'Undefined', null, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined'
ORDER BY amp_theme_id;
